text: Sa kho so bhante ariyasāvako evaṃ averacitto evaṃ abyāpajjhacitto evaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhacitto evaṃ visuddhacitto
edit: Sa kho so bhante ariyasāvako evaṃ averacitto evaṃ abyāpajjhacitto evaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhacitto evaṃ visuddhacitto

translations.transtext: Sir, which that noble disciple, having such a friendly mind, having such a merciful mind, having such an impeccable mind, having such a pure mind,
